bibl.title: Material Culture and Texts of Graeco-Roman Egypt: Creating Context, Debating Meaning

bibl.seg: DAVOLI Paola, Examples of Town Planning in the Fayyum. Avec résumé en anglais.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor-in-Chief), Jennifer E. GATES, Andrew T. WILBURN (Guest Editors), Timothy RENNER, John WHITEHORNE (Editors), Material Culture and Texts of Graeco-Roman Egypt: Creating Context, Debating Meaning = BASP 42 (2005) Special Thematic Section, pp. 213-233, 1 tabl. et pll. 8-18.

Paper presented at the Joint American Institute of Archaeology and American Philological Association meeting, Boston, January 7, 2005. - Joint Archaeological Mission of Bologna and Lecce Universities, 1993-. - Introduction. - Bacchias. - Soknopaiou Nesos. - Conclusion.
